General.Name: Biostar Microtech International Corp
General.Description: Biostar Microtech International Corp. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of add-on cards, and multi-media and system products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers motherboards, SSD and SOC products, keyboards/mouses, VGA and IPC products, crypto mining motherboards, and accessories. It also provides accessories, such as cables, headsets, brackets, dongles, IO shields, and other products. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 108-2, Min Chuan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
